name: Frutiverse
description:
The game takes place in the Frutiverse, which is inhabited by intelligent Fruits and other creatures. After years of devastating wars, truce between major fractions was signed but there are still ongoing scrimitches on frontier. Now it's time to take command of your own ship and became master of your destiny.

Currently the project is in early stage of development. First version will contain a simple skirmish mode. I'll be adding multiplayer shortly after, so I'll have a complete stack where I can develop and test all the other features.

Current features
  • Fully destructible environment
  • Orbital dynamic
Planned features
  • Skirmish mode with base destroying
  • Multiplayer
  • More ship types, items and upgrades
  • Living universe, where your actions have permanent impact
  • Multiple solar systems
  • Different planet types
  • Space stations
  • Planets terraformation
